sentences.sContent: If she had only heeded my warnings , none of this would have happened.
sentences.sCn: 要是她当初听从我的警告，这一切都不会发生。

remMethod.val: 和need(n. 需要)一起记； 需要(need)的东西格外注意、 留心(heed)

words.tran: 注意的；深切注意的；深切留心的
掉以轻心地；不加注意地

trans.tranOther: to pay attention to someone’s advice or warning
to pay attention to something, especially something someone says, and seriously consider it
